title: When is the Strictly Come Dancing Live tour and how can you get tickets?
text:
The Strictly Live tour is back (Picture: PA)

The Strictly Come Dancing Live tour is back in 2020, keeping the sequins, glitter and glam going long after the glitterball trophy-winners have been crowned.

Although the professional dancers and the celebrities joining them on next year’s tour haven’t been announced yet, the host of the show has been confirmed and it’s none other than last year’s champion, Stacey Dooley.

After taking part in the tour last year with her former Strictly partner, now boyfriend, Kevin Clifton, Stacey revealed that she can’t wait to join the team on the road again for Strictly Live.

She said: ‘I’m so excited to be joining the Strictly gang again and can’t wait to experience it from a different perspective! I’m really looking forward to hosting the tour as I know it’ll be a blast. I had such an amazing time last year, I hope I’ll find a way to get those dancing shoes back on again too!’

Advertisement

Advertisement

When is the Strictly Come Dancing Live tour?

Strictly Come Dancing, The Live Tour, takes place in January and February 2020.

There are 32 shows planned in total for the tour, with the first show taking place on Thursday 16 January 2020 at the Arena in Birmingham and the finale show happening on Sunday 9 February 2020 and London’s 02 Arena.

The celebrities from this year’s cast who will take part in the tour haven’t been announced yet. (Picture: BBC)

There are also shows taking place in Aberdeen, Leeds, Manchester, Dublin, Belfast, Glasgow and Nottingham.

There will be both matinee and evening performances on at least one date in every city the tour is visiting.

Strictly Come Dancing Live tour dates Arena Birmingham Thursday 16 January 2020 Friday 17 January 2020 Saturday 18 January 2020 Sunday 19 January 2020 Aberdeen P&J Live Arena Tuesday 21 January 2020 Wednesday 22 January 2020 First Direct Arena – Leeds Friday 24 January 2020 Manchester Arena Saturday 25 January 2020 Sunday 26 January 2020 Dublin 3Arena Tuesday 28 January 2020 Belfast SSE Arena Wednesday 29 January 2020 Belfast SSE Arena Thursday 30 January 2020 Glasgow The SSE Hydro Saturday 1 February 2020 Sunday 2 February 2020 Nottingham Motorpoint Arena Tuesday 4 February 2020 Wednesday 5 February 2020 London The O2 Arena Friday 7 February 2020 Saturday 8 February 2020 Sunday 9 February 2020

How can you get tickets for the Strictly Come Dancing Live tour?

You can book tickets to see the Strictly Come Dancing Live tour through their official website.

Ticket prices will vary depending on the venue and date, but prices start at £35 for a ticket to see Strictly Come Dancing Live 2020 at the 02 Arena in London.

Strictly is next on tonight, Saturday 26 October, on BBC One.
